Summary: Dark gray spheric ( round ) object , close to my right shoulder , deep in the picture
divs: Sighting DetailsI only noticed this object last saturday , when I scanned the picture to put inside my computer and on the net . I have had several sightseeings at this place , but this is the only evidence I captured , "accidentally" , because my Mom took the picture and I was with my back towards the event . I really believe it���s possible to be an UFO , because I lived at this place 6 months of my life , and I know this place very well . It could not be a weather ballon , because right after this picture ( 20 seconds ) , it was taken another picture and the object was not there anymore . This place ( SANA -- A district of the city of MACA��� ) is 130 km from Rio de Janeiro , it���s a rural area , with very low population and it is famous to be a sightseeing place , as I said , I have had many sightseeings at this place . I would really like this picture to be analysed by experts , and just in case , I have the original one and looks just the same , taken by a non digital camera . Hope to hear from you soon , thanks for your atention , because I have sent this pictures to many Brazilian net sites and got no answer . When my mom took the picture , I was at a desert site , with no houses at my sightseeing , going to a desert waterfall . The first time I noticed the object I was pretty sure it was an UFO , just like I said before , I noticed it 2 and a half years after the event , last saturday , when I was scanning the picture .
trends: There have been no other sightings in Macaé
